trans-unit.source: Displays the name of the module.
trans-unit.target: Displays the name of the module.

trans-unit.source: Enter a title for the module. The title will appear in the title bar of the container for this module, if supported by the container.
trans-unit.target: Enter a title for the module. The title will appear in the title bar of the container for this module, if supported by the container.

trans-unit.source: Check the box to to display the module in the same location on all site pages.
trans-unit.target: Check the box to to display the module in the same location on all site pages.

trans-unit.source: Choose the default visibility for this module. I.e. whether the module is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: Choose the default visibility for this module. I.e. whether the module is collapsed or expanded.

trans-unit.source: Select the page this module instance will be moved to.
trans-unit.target: Select the page this module instance will be moved to.

trans-unit.source: Enter header text that will appear above the content of this module.
trans-unit.target: Enter header text that will appear above the content of this module.

trans-unit.source: Enter footer text that will appear below the content of this module.
trans-unit.target: Enter footer text that will appear below the content of this module.

trans-unit.source: Select an icon to display in the title bar of this module.
trans-unit.target: Select an icon to display in the title bar of this module.

trans-unit.source: Select the default alignment of module content.
trans-unit.target: Select the default alignment of module content.

trans-unit.source: Enter a color name or hexadecimal value for the background of this module.
trans-unit.target: Enter a color name or hexadecimal value for the background of this module.

trans-unit.source: Enter a border width for the module.
trans-unit.target: Enter a border width for the module.

trans-unit.source: Select a container for the module.
trans-unit.target: Select a container for the module.

trans-unit.source: Select the View and Edit permissions by checking/unchecking the boxes in the grid. Check the Inherit View Permissions box to use the page permission for the module.
trans-unit.target: Select the View and Edit permissions by checking/unchecking the boxes in the grid. Check the Inherit View Permissions box to use the page permission for the module.

trans-unit.source: Enter the number of seconds the content of this module is cached.
trans-unit.target: Enter the number of seconds the content of this module is cached.

trans-unit.source: Select the start date for displaying this module. The module will only be visible to users with Manage permissions prior to this date.
trans-unit.target: Select the start date for displaying this module. The module will only be visible to users with Manage permissions prior to this date.

trans-unit.source: Select the lnd date for displaying this module. The module will only be visible to users with Manage permissions after this date.
trans-unit.target: Select the lnd date for displaying this module. The module will only be visible to users with Manage permissions after this date.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for this module on the page. This can be used by WEB API callers to set the context of the Tab and Module context.
trans-unit.target: A unique identifier for this module on the page. This can be used by WEB API callers to set the context of the Tab and Module context.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to use the Page Settings of this module as the default settings when adding new modules. Administrators only.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to use the Page Settings of this module as the default settings when adding new modules. Administrators only.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to apply the Page Settings of this module to all existing modules. Administrators only.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to apply the Page Settings of this module to all existing modules. Administrators only.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to display the module container.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to display the module container.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to enable printing on this module.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to enable printing on this module.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to enable RSS on this module.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to enable RSS on this module.

trans-unit.source:
Module Settings

Manage the Module Settings for the current Page. This allows you to specify characteristics of the module including content, permissions, and display properties.
trans-unit.target:
Module Settings

Manage the Module Settings for the current Page. This allows you to specify characteristics of the module including content, permissions, and display properties.

trans-unit.source: Invalid Border (must be a number between 0 and 9).
trans-unit.target: Invalid Border (must be a number between 0 and 9).

trans-unit.source: End Date must be after Start Date.
trans-unit.target: End Date must be after Start Date.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to add the module to new pages only. Administrators only.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to add the module to new pages only. Administrators only.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to make this module an IE8 Web Slice.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to make this module an IE8 Web Slice.

trans-unit.source: Enter a date when the Web Slice will expire or leave blank to use the module's end date.
trans-unit.target: Enter a date when the Web Slice will expire or leave blank to use the module's end date.

trans-unit.source: Enter a title for the Web Slice or leave blank to use the module title.
trans-unit.target: Enter a title for the Web Slice or leave blank to use the module title.

trans-unit.source: Enter the Time to Live (TTL) for this Web Slice in minutes or leave blank to use the module's cache time (converted to minutes).
trans-unit.target: Enter the Time to Live (TTL) for this Web Slice in minutes or leave blank to use the module's cache time (converted to minutes).

trans-unit.source: Invalid TTL - value must be an integer.
trans-unit.target: Invalid TTL - value must be an integer.

trans-unit.source: This module has been added to the following pages:
trans-unit.target: This module has been added to the following pages:

trans-unit.source: This list displays the pages this module was added to using the Add Existing Module feature. An existing module can be added to other pages by using the Add Existing Module feature.
trans-unit.target: This list displays the pages this module was added to using the Add Existing Module feature. An existing module can be added to other pages by using the Add Existing Module feature.

trans-unit.source: This module instance has not been added to any additional pages.
trans-unit.target: This module instance has not been added to any additional pages.

trans-unit.source: This module instance is displayed on all pages.
trans-unit.target: This module instance is displayed on all pages.

trans-unit.source: This module already exists on the target page (it may be in the Recycle Bin) and only one instance of a module can exist on a page.
trans-unit.target: This module already exists on the target page (it may be in the Recycle Bin) and only one instance of a module can exist on a page.

trans-unit.source: Select the provider to use for this page.
trans-unit.target: Select the provider to use for this page.

trans-unit.source: Enter the duration (in seconds) to cache the page for. This must be an integer.
trans-unit.target: Enter the duration (in seconds) to cache the page for. This must be an integer.

trans-unit.source: Clear Cache for This Tab Module
trans-unit.target: Clear Cache for This Tab Module

trans-unit.source: Clear Cache for All Tab Modules
trans-unit.target: Clear Cache for All Tab Modules

trans-unit.source: Current Cache Count: {0} item for this tab module.
trans-unit.target: Current Cache Count: {0} item for this tab module.

trans-unit.source: This module has indicated a recommendation to disable caching (select NONE from the Output Cache Provider list above). Enabling caching on this module is not recommended and may cause the module to display stale data.
trans-unit.target: This module has indicated a recommendation to disable caching (select NONE from the Output Cache Provider list above). Enabling caching on this module is not recommended and may cause the module to display stale data.

trans-unit.source: Select items from the drop-down to tag this module.
trans-unit.target: Select items from the drop-down to tag this module.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to display a red border around the module to Administrators when they are logged into the site.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to display a red border around the module to Administrators when they are logged into the site.

trans-unit.source: Click this link to view the version of this module in the default culture.
trans-unit.target: Click this link to view the version of this module in the default culture.

trans-unit.source: This module has not been added to any other pages.
trans-unit.target: This module has not been added to any other pages.

trans-unit.source: Check this box if the module should be indexed by search crawlers.
trans-unit.target: Check this box if the module should be indexed by search crawlers.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to allow the module to be shared across sites.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to allow the module to be shared across sites.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to restrict the module to be shared as View Only.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to restrict the module to be shared as View Only.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the moniker already exists; it must be unique in the portal.
trans-unit.target: The new value of the moniker already exists; it must be unique in the portal.
